/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, the iconic Great Wall of China can be seen, adding a historical touch to the modern cityscape.
